official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations for that Act, and to make technical corrections.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend through FY 2002 the authorization of appropriations for: (1) the Federal Council on the Aging; (2) administration; (3) grants for State and community programs on aging; (4) the availability of surplus commodities; (5) training, research, and discretionary projects and programs; (6) community service employment for older Americans; (7) grants for Native Americans; (8) allotments for Vulnerable Elder Rights Protection activities; and (9) the Native American program.

titles.title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations for that Act, and to make technical corrections.
